import React , {Component} from 'react' export default class ChampionInfo extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { champion: {} } } componentDidUpdate(prevProps){ if(prevProps.championId !== this.props.championId){ fetch(` http://localhost:3000/champions/${146}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(champion => this.setState({champion})) } } displayChampionAbilities = (abilities) => { return abilities.map(a => { return(

{a.id}

{a.name}

- Description: {a.description}

- Cooldown: {a.cooldown.join("/")}

) }) } displayChampion = (champion) => { if(champion.name){ return (

{champion.title.toUpperCase()}






{champion.blurb}

Stats

{Object.keys(champion.stats).map(key => )}

Lore

{champion.lore}

Allytips

{champion.allytips.map(allytip =>

-{allytip}

)}

Enemytips

{champion.enemytips.map(enemytip =>

-{enemytip}

)}

ABILITIES

{champion.name} Passive

{champion.passive.name}

- Description: {champion.passive.description.replace(/<[^>]*>/g, '')}

{this.displayChampionAbilities(champion.spells)}

Champion Spotlight

{champion.skins.map(skin =>
)}
) } } render(){ let champion = this.state.champion return(
{this.displayChampion(champion)}
) } }
